snippet.title: The Bookwalker - Announcement trailer | Sign up for the Playtest now! | tinyBuild Connect
snippet.description:
Sign up for the BookWalker playtest on Steam now! Learn more: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1432100/The_Bookwalker/

You’re a Bookwalker — a thief with an ability to dive into books. You are forced to use your powers to track and steal famous items like Thor’s Hammer and the Excalibur for clients, to regain your ability to write again.

#TheBookWalker #tinyBuildConnect
